column4: I want to start compain aimed to save GIMP in Ubuntu (developers going to remove GIMP from standart distribution in Ubuntu 10.04). How many people will support me?
it will still be in the main repository, just not installed by default...just sudo apt-get install gimp
the idea is that the average user probably doesn't need to do much graphics editing, for the rest of us, we can easily install whatever we want from the repos
maybe gimp is too hard for average user as grafic editor, but F-SPOT isnt editor at all. Thay shoud keep some editor as I beleive
